recipe.title: Mango Sour
ingredients: a cocktail shaker; 6 (12-oz) double Old Fashioned glasses
instructions: Stir together nectar, vodka, lemon juice, and sugar in a 1-quart glass measure. Shake half of mixture in cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes until cold, about 30 seconds. Strain into glasses half filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain remaining nectar mixture in same manner.
